content: quick and easy to knit fingerless mittens - using aran weight yarn sizes child teen adult requires aran weight yarn ~ around 25g for a child 28g for a teen 34g for an adult if you are using acrylic dk 5mm and 5 5mm needles worked flat and then seamed so easy a great last minute gift idea especially good for those who like texting or playing games on their phone **to get this free pattern please click on the https link just below ↓**
